scripts.deploy:staging: NODE_ENV=staging pnpm build; aws s3 rm --recursive s3://staging.awscmd.tw/_astro/ --profile cmd; aws s3 sync ./dist s3://staging.awscmd.tw/ --profile cmd; aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id E2IR73S6GAYL5W --paths "/*" --profile cmd
scripts.deploy: NODE_ENV=production pnpm build; aws s3 rm --recursive s3://awscmd.tw/_astro/ --profile cmd; aws s3 sync ./dist s3://awscmd.tw/ --profile cmd; aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id E3M3YD0HPV4G0W --paths "/*" --profile cmd
